unnormalised: Hey everyone, any news on Bumrah's injury? Heard he might miss the Asia Cup. Also, what's the latest on Pant after his accident near Roorkee back on 30/12/2022? Recovering well, I hope! Any updates on the kabaddi players too? The Pro Kabaddi League auctions are soon, right? Saw Ravi Dahiya got injured during training on 15/07/2023 at 14:00 hrs. Wishing him a speedy recovery! Get well soon champ! The finals at 19:00 hrs on 20/08/2023 need him.
normalised: Hey everyone, any news on Bumrah's injury? Heard he might miss the Asia Cup. Also, what's the latest on Pant after his accident near Roorkee back on thirtieth december two thousand and twenty two? Recovering well, I hope! Any updates on the kabaddi players too? The Pro Kabaddi League auctions are soon, right? Saw Ravi Dahiya got injured during training on fifteenth july two thousand and twenty three at fourteen hundred hours. Wishing him a speedy recovery! Get well soon champ! The finals at nineteen hundred hours on twentieth august two thousand and twenty three need him.
